affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: Discover the original co-op shooter-looter, crammed with new enhancements! As one of 4 trigger-happy mercenaries with RPG progression, equip bazillions of guns to take on the desert planet Pandora.
review:
If I had to pay for this I'd be pretty upset.

Had a group ready to play on launch only to find out the multiplayer is completely broken. Enemies will teleport around and bullets will take seconds to hit after firing. Even having push to talk your voice will sometimes transmit in lobby screens and in game
The map has a bug where a custom waypoint will be set when you open the menu.
I don't know what's wrong with the engine but I'm constantly getting stuck on random objects for a couple seconds. I noticed in the beginning that skags would randomly scale mountains after leaping towards you.
They said they buffed the last boss in the main game and it feels like nothing was changed. 
I'm seeing people say there's no 21:9 support.

For $30 this feels pretty terrible. Hopefully they fix multiplayer :c
review_bomb_reason: Ein paar Monate vor Release von Borderlands 3 wurde von Entwickler "Gearbox Software" und Publisher "2K" bekannt gegeben, dass Borderlands 3 eine Zeit lang exklusiv im neuen (und kontroversen) Epic Games Store angeboten werden würde, und nicht auf anderen Plattformen wie Steam. Deshalb erhielten ältere Teile der Borderlands - Serie auf Steam und Metacritic negative Reviews.

affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: Discover the original co-op shooter-looter, crammed with new enhancements! As one of 4 trigger-happy mercenaries with RPG progression, equip bazillions of guns to take on the desert planet Pandora.
review:
A free "Upgrade", however the online is HORRID, the only good thing being the..graphics..The old bugs are still in game + new ones:

Voice chat has to be deactivated trough the .ini cause the option to do it in the Settings...THOSE NOT WORK WHAT SO EVER. (Not to mention one of the reasons to cause lag in game...)

The Game lags like hell in certain areas, even tho i'm playing in the same internet as my brother

The game has performance issues that you need to edit the .ini again to fix the dumb sluter

You need to edit the ,INI YET AGAIN to have more then 60hz

The golden case was really not necessary but it's a neutral opinion on my side, it's not a bad thing, but also not really needed.

WHY THE HELL THOSE IT NOT HAVE A LAN MODE IS BEYOND ME.

AND HECK YOU CAN'T PLAY WITH YOU'R FRIEND IF THEY ARE NOT IN THE SAME DONE QUESTS AS YOU, OR ELSE THEY WON'T GET THE QUESTS YOU DO EXP,

And the newly added "Gearbox" Weapons are not special in anyway shape or form, they are standard weapons with the same skin, if anything they could be signed as Purple Rarity..not Legendary, as they are anything BUT Legendary..

SURE it was gifted..but i still rather play the old version as the new.."Graphics" are really the only thing good in this version... Everything else is just..disappointing overall.
JUST ANOTHER GEARBOX "GAME" AM I R8.
They can't even just simply...add 4k textures and a DECENT FOV OPTION (IT RESETS TO THE DEFAULT FOV WHEN YOU REVIVE SOMEONE, RUNNING FIXES IT BUT STILL) without making the game buggier.. not to mention removing the Lan option being "FANTASTIC" Altogether.

THIS GAME IS SO GOOD, THANK THE HEAVENS THAT THEY MADE IT.

This game has spectacular graphics and in-depth charectar creation, this is the best game i've ever played ever since Roblox came out.

Let's play this game together because it has massive servers where the maps are endless. On single player i made an entire dirt house by myself in under 3 hours.

Genesis online is obviously better then Minecraft in every way, get this game for free and don't waste your money on a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ game like Minecraft.

10 out of 10 pls share and spread the good news

affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: Discover the original co-op shooter-looter, crammed with new enhancements! As one of 4 trigger-happy mercenaries with RPG progression, equip bazillions of guns to take on the desert planet Pandora.
review: This game is ass, no cool weapons, had to disable the voice chat in order to properly play online, FUCK A CLAPTRAP, boss was supposedly made "more difficult" but was still easier than every other boss in the game. If you want to play borderlands, play either the original Borderlands unenhanced, or either of the other two. DO NOT PLAY, GAME IS BAD, used to love this one above all of the others but now i want to uninstall it and never touch it in my life.

affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: Launch into the Borderlands universe and shoot ‘n’ loot your way through a brand new adventure that rockets you onto Pandora’s moon in Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel!
review: It's very repetitive in a way that previous games aren't. You'll go through some of the same areas over and over and over and over again that I found myself literally just running through them and avoiding combat because it just became really tiresome to kill the same enemies over and over and over again. In reality it should be a 20 hours game that's very clearly added grinding to pad out the length. It's more like DLC to Borderlands 2 than it's own game. It has few new features, same graphics as B2 and is very skippable.

game_description: The Ultimate Vault Hunter’s Upgrade lets you get the most out of the Borderlands 2 experience.
review:
I can’t believe my hand is being forced to use such a ANTI-CONSUMER game launcher made by the people that made Fortnite. 
As a gamer, I feel oppressed and attacked for having to use another store that is ran by COMMIES. 
The state of gaming is terrifying if marketplaces are buying out companies to force gamers to use different stores... We need a gaming revolution....


We did it Reddit!

affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: Launch into the Borderlands universe and shoot ‘n’ loot your way through a brand new adventure that rockets you onto Pandora’s moon in Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel!
review:
Terrible map-design, unmemorable monotone sad scenery, weak uncharismatic annoying villain, dull NPCs, tedious side quests, boring gameplay and bosses, most of the people I know couldn't even finish it :D

Good only for the lore value, was interesting to see how repeating betrayals from every side gradually made John a Handsome psychopath
also Claptastic Voyage DLC was surprisingly well done

if you ever find the courage to play it, invite another poor soul at your aid, as they say misery loves company

affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: Launch into the Borderlands universe and shoot ‘n’ loot your way through a brand new adventure that rockets you onto Pandora’s moon in Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel!
review: So comparably speaking this would be a passable game, however after putting several hours into this game, at the request of my brother, who loves it, I have found it atrocious. I do not like it. I was neigh invincible, then suddenly I just keep dying, over and over. This has a lot to do with bugs, but several times it had to do with reloading weapons while I was down and had to kill an enemy. WHY DOES IT TAKE SO LONG TO RELOAD??? I've never had that be a consistent reason for death in any game. Graphically not as amazing as Borderlands 2. Gameplay is inferior to every Borderlands so far. New additions are nice, such as class, however ultimately I had to give this a thumbs down, because I realized it was just a horrible sequel and I ultimately felt the time I spent on the game was a waste.

affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: The Ultimate Vault Hunter’s Upgrade lets you get the most out of the Borderlands 2 experience.
review:
I tried this game again after years and remembered enjoying the series when I was younger. Unfortunately, this game hasn't aged well at all. The fetch quests feel repetitive and unrewarding. The art style which was completely unique at the time gets extremely bland after the initial "oh wow this is neat and different" feeling wears off.

Even with friends this game gets extremely boring after 30min

affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: Discover the original co-op shooter-looter, crammed with new enhancements! As one of 4 trigger-happy mercenaries with RPG progression, equip bazillions of guns to take on the desert planet Pandora.
review:
NOT A REVIEW BOMBING!

Honesly i have never played borderlands before, and i wanted to give it a try with this one, cause of the new graphics and the FOV slider that is essential for me. But damn, the lag is incredible! my pc has all the requirements to run this smoothly but even in low graphics there is a frame drop that made me unistall instantly the title. I was told that in the first original the FOV slider is not present, and that i have to change it anytime i do actions that changes the camera mode via console command. Not checked for a permanent solution yet tbh, but it is still annoying and i'm not feeling to install it. So, yes i'm lazy, but you publisher better stand up from the couch and put some work on it, cause apparently i'm not the only one with these problems! If the problem get solved i'm going to rewrite an appropriate review for it.

affected_games: "Borderlands" - Serie: Borderlands (und GOTY - Editionen), Borderlands 2 und Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
game_description: Discover the original co-op shooter-looter, crammed with new enhancements! As one of 4 trigger-happy mercenaries with RPG progression, equip bazillions of guns to take on the desert planet Pandora.
review:
Pros:
- adjustable FOV
- minimap
- better textures
- bit more customization
- auto pickup
- free because I own the original game
- not Epic Store exclusive (unlike BL3)

Cons:
- the lowest graphic settings are still quite high
- doesn't support DX9
- glitchy cutscenes
